Interface SpeechDelegate


  • public interface SpeechDelegate

      Invoked when there are partial speech results.

    • Method Detail

      • onStartOfSpeech

        void onStartOfSpeech()
        Invoked when the speech recognition is started.

      • onSpeechRmsChanged

        void onSpeechRmsChanged(float value)
        The sound level in the audio stream has changed. There is no guarantee that this method will be called.
        Parameters:
        value - the new RMS dB value

      • onSpeechPartialResults

        void onSpeechPartialResults(java.util.List<java.lang.String> results)
        Invoked when there are partial speech results.
        Parameters:
        results - list of strings. This is ensured to be non null and non empty.

      • onSpeechResult

        void onSpeechResult(java.lang.String result)
        Invoked when there is a speech result
        Parameters:
        result - string resulting from speech recognition. This is ensured to be non null.
